name: TGMessageStore
description: Telegram Bot to Create Permanent Shareable Links to a Batch of Messages

ADMINS.description: List of telegram IDs of users allowed to create links with the bot, seperated by spaces.

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: Set this to true to prevent users from forwarding/copying content from the bot

ALLOW_PUBLIC.description: Set this to true to allow anyone to create batch links.

AUTO_DELETE.description: Number of minutes after which messages should be automatically deleted.

DISABLE_NOTIFICATION.description: Set this to true to send messages without a notification.

BATCH_SIZE_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of messages allowed in a batch.

FSUB.description: List of IDs of channels the user must join to get content, seperated by spaces.

DB_CHANNEL.description: Database channel only used for backward compatibilty with codex links.
